p: In tumor tissues of the treated mice, HMWp greatly increased the number of TUNEL-positive apoptotic cells (stained in dark brown) in comparison with the PBS control ( Figs. 4A and 4B). Quantification using ImageJ software showed that the average percentage of TUNEL-positive cells in HMWp-treated mice (18.2%) was significantly ( p < 0.05) higher than the control mice (2.5%) ( Fig. 4C ).
